member.name: IVirtualDesktopManager.GetWindowDesktopId
member.summary: Gets the identifier for the virtual desktop hosting the provided top-level window.
member.param: The top level window for the virtual desktop you are interested in.
The identifier for the virtual desktop hosting the topLevelWindow.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.param: True if the topLevelWindow is on the currently active virtual desktop, otherwise false.

member.name: IVirtualDesktopManager
member.summary: Exposes methods that enable an application to interact with groups of windows that form virtual workspaces. This interface is implemented by VirtualDesktopManager, a COM class identified by CLSID_VirtualDesktopManager. Use CoCreateInstance(CLSID_VirtualDesktopManager) to get an instance of this object.
